passages.guidance: Questions 131-134 refer to the following notice.
passages.title: Sky Air First Pass
passages.content:
Thank you for flying Sky Air First with [131]. We hope you enjoy your flight.

You can take advantage of our best prices on future flights purchasing a Sky Air First Pass.

[132] For a [133] annual fee, you will get special discounts, seat upgrades, and the use of our exclusive travelers' lounge. [134] . Ask your flight attendant for more information and an application.

options.label: A
options.text: We hope you will fly Sky Air First again.

options.label: B
options.text: You will also get priority boarding.

options.label: D
options.text: The flight delay will be minimal.

passages.guidance: Questions 135-138 refer to the following article.
passages.title: CJOK Radio Show Welcomes New Staff
passages.content:
QUEENSVILLE (7 July) â€”Local radio station CJOK announced Katherine Dees as the new producer of the popular show Out and About in Queensville. Ms. Dees is now [135] for coordinating schedules, booking guests for the show, and managing media relations.

[136] , the station hired sound editor Virginia Thacker and production assistant Reggie Dietrich to support Ms. Dees in her new role.

[137] Out and About in Queensville, which has been airing for 30 years, is performed live weekly from September to May in the Orpheum Theater in downtown Queensville. The show [138] musical guests, writers, and storytellers for an hour of weekly programming.

options.label: B
options.text: These recent hires follow the retirement of producer Ed Evans.

options.label: C
options.text: Ms. Dees was born and raised in Cedarburg.

options.label: D
options.text: CJOK has more than one popular show in its lineup.

passages.guidance: Questions 139-142 refer to the following e-mail.
passages.content:
To: Sandra Barga <sbarga97@hjmail.ca>
From: Artie Romanche <service@northwestbags.ca>
Date: 12 July
Subject: Order number 71280

Dear Ms. Barga:

We received your recent order asking for your name to be stitched on a Klamath Kool handbag.

We are, [139] , eager to complete your order. Unfortunately, our seamstress who fulfills personalisation requirements will be on leave for the next three days. We wanted to let you know that her [140] will causeadelay in shipping your bag.

[141] for the wait, we would like to offer you a 10 percent discount on your current order. Or, if you prefer, you can opt for free personalisation on your next order. [142] . At Northwest Bags, we strive for 100 percent customer satisfaction!

Sincerely, Artie Romanche Customer Service Representative, Northwest Bags

options.label: C
options.text: The bag will look great with your initials on it.

options.label: D
options.text: We are the only local retailer offering custom services.

passages.guidance: Questions 143-146 refer to the following article.
passages.title: Sehelec Announces Wind-Solar Hybrid Project
passages.content:
MUMBAI (15 March)-Sehelec Ltd. announced it will begin construction on a 500-megawatt wind-solar hybrid power [143] outside of Bangalore, India. Sehelec expects to begin operations within 24 months, and it will sell the power to Indian energy giant Novaseon Industries.

"Our contract with Novaseon to provide [145] power moves us closer to our long-term corporate goal," said Sumit Varma, CEO of Sehelec. "Our objective is to achieveacapacity of 20 gigawatts within five years. Doing so will make us one of India's largest green power companies. And that, in turn, will help the country [146] its carbon-reduction target." [144].

options.label: A
options.text: Windy conditions can cause damage to tall buildings.

options.label: B
options.text: The facility will consist of a mix of solar panels and wind turbines.

options.label: C
options.text: Electric vehicles have fewer emissions than other vehicles have.

options.label: D
options.text: The pace of upgrades to India's power grid slowed slightly this year.
